amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds to be used to enforce the judgment in Newdow v. U.S. Congress, dealing with the recitation of the Pledge of Allegiance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restrict the use of funds from being used to enforce the judgment in Newdow v. U.S. Congress 292 F.3d 597 (9th Cir. 2002).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 307 - 119 (Roll no. 406).
